kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: PUT On Session
kw.doc: Sends a PUT request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: PUT Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios/susXVV8VDdM3MOhW path_url=/usuarios/susXVV8VDdM3MOhW headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '118', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"nome": "Lizzie Grant", "email": "stargirlinterlude@gmail.com", "password": "ultraviolence", "administrador": "true"}'

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Should Match
kw.doc: Fails if the given ``string`` does not match the given ``pattern``.
